mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.card_num AS "cardNum", a.sex AS "sex", a.party_branch AS "partyBranch", a.party_branch_id AS "partyBranchId", a.personnel_category AS "personnelCategory", a.nation AS "nation", a.birthplace AS "birthplace", a.is_taiwan AS "isTaiwan", a.birth AS "birth", a.education AS "education", a.join_date AS "joinDate", a.turn_date AS "turnDate", a.work_place AS "workPlace", a.work_date AS "workDate", a.phone_num AS "phoneNum", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.home_address AS "homeAddress", a.marital_status AS "maritalStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_org_id AS "createOrgId", a.create_id_no AS "createIdNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_org_id AS "updateOrgId", a.update_id_no AS "updateIdNo", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.delete_reason AS "deleteReason", a.police_no AS "policeNo", a.status2 AS "status2", a.person AS "person", a.personnel_category2 AS "personnelCategory2", a.personnel_type AS "personnelType", a.sort AS "sort"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.create_org_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO affair_party_member( id, name, card_num, sex, party_branch, party_branch_id, personnel_category, nation, birthplace, is_taiwan, birth, education, join_date, turn_date, work_place, work_date, phone_num, telephone, home_address, marital_status, create_by, create_org_id, create_id_no, create_date, update_by, update_org_id, update_id_no, update_date, del_flag, delete_reason, police_no, status2, person, personnel_category2, personnel_type, sort ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{cardNum}, #{sex}, #{partyBranch}, #{partyBranchId}, #{personnelCategory}, #{nation}, #{birthplace}, #{isTaiwan}, #{birth}, #{education}, #{joinDate}, #{turnDate}, #{workPlace}, #{workDate}, #{phoneNum}, #{telephone}, #{homeAddress}, #{maritalStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createBy.office.id}, #{createIdNo}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateBy.office.id}, #{updateIdNo}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{deleteReason}, #{policeNo}, #{status2}, #{person}, #{personnelCategory2}, #{personnelType}, #{sort} )
mapper.update: UPDATE affair_party_member SET name = #{name}, card_num = #{cardNum}, sex = #{sex}, party_branch = #{partyBranch}, party_branch_id = #{partyBranchId}, personnel_category = #{personnelCategory}, nation = #{nation}, birthplace = #{birthplace}, is_taiwan = #{isTaiwan}, birth = #{birth}, education = #{education}, join_date = #{joinDate}, turn_date = #{turnDate}, work_place = #{workPlace}, work_date = #{workDate}, phone_num = #{phoneNum}, telephone = #{telephone}, home_address = #{homeAddress}, marital_status = #{maritalStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_org_id = #{updateBy.office.id}, update_id_no = #{updateIdNo}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_reason = #{deleteReason}, police_no = #{policeNo}, status2 = #{status2}, person = #{person}, personnel_category2 = #{personnelCategory2}, personnel_type = #{personnelType}, sort = #{sort} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from affair_party_member where card_num = #{idNo} and del_flag = '0'

SELECT a.party_branch FROM affair_party_member a
WHERE a.card_num = #{idNumber} AND a.del_flag = '0'
SELECT a.id, a.card_num, a.name FROM affair_party_member a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.party_branch_id = #{partyBranchId} ORDER BY a.name

SELECT a.party_branch_id FROM affair_party_member a
WHERE a.card_num = #{idNo} AND a.del_flag = '0'

select
from affair_party_member a where a.card_num = #{idNo} and a.del_flag = '0'
select a.name AS "name", a.card_num AS "cardNum" from affair_party_member a where a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT
FROM affair_party_member a
WHERE a.card_num=#{cardNum} and a.del_flag = '0'
select a.name, a.card_num from affair_party_member a where a.del_flag = '0' AND a.party_branch = #{org}
select a.name from affair_party_member a where a.del_flag = '0' AND a.party_branch_id = #{unitId} AND a.name != #{name}
select party_branch from affair_party_member where card_num = #{id}
select party_branch_id from affair_party_member where party_branch = #{unit}
SELECT * FROM affair_party_member WHERE del_flag = '0' AND party_branch_id = #{unitId} AND to_char ( "join_date", 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) BETWEEN #{yearL} AND #{yearT}
select from affair_party_member a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND to_char("join_date", 'mm-dd' ) = #{threeDayAfter}
select count(*) from affair_party_member a where a.del_flag = '0' and a.party_branch_id = #{partyId}
